title: SOE: the space on earth project & quantum city project.
abstract: This piece features excerpts from the SOE Project, which joins architecture, design, technology, science, entertainment technology, new-generation connectivity, and adaptability, and features unconventional concepts of urbanism and human habitat, networked and interactive augmented-reality environments, eco-sustainable infrastructures, and intelligent buildings in which guests experience the sense of living in outer space while on earth.
